title: Grateful Dead Live at Providence Civic Center on 1981-05-13
lineage: MAC copied to 1st Gen Maxell XL-II 90's on Nakamichi 680ZX. 1st Gen cassettes > Nakamichi DR-2 > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab 2448 > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 2448 Tagged.
source: 3x Nakamichi CM-300 w/CP-1 cardioids > Nakamichi 550. Mics on stand, 25th row right center.
